gurmukhi: chUM Er Gyro pirE qby cMf ieh kIn ]
transliteration: Chahoon Or Ghero Pario Tabe Channd Eh Koon||
translation: When Chadi was besieged from all the four sides, she did this:

gurmukhi: kwlI so his iqn khI nYn sYn kir dIn ]208]
transliteration: Kaaloo So Has(i) Tin Kahoo Nain Sain Kar(i) Doon||208||
translation: She laughed and said to Kali, also hinting with her eyes.208.

gurmukhi: kyqy mwr fwry Aaur kyqk cbwie fwry kyqk bgwie fwry kwlI kop qb hI ]
transliteration: Kete Maar Ddare Aur Ketak Chabade Ddare Ketak Bagade Ddare Kaaloo Kop Tab Hoo||
translation: When Chandi hinted to Kali, she killed many, chewed many and threw many far away, in great rage.

gurmukhi: bwj gj Bwry qyqo nKn soN Pwr fwry AYso rn BYkr n BieE Awgy kb hI ]
transliteration: Baaj Gad Bhdare Teto Nakhanndson Phaar Ddare Aiso Ran Bhaikar Na Bhaio Aage Kab Hoo||
translation: She ripped with her nails, many big elephants and horses; such a war was waged that had not been waged before.

gurmukhi: Bwgy bhu bIr kwhU su`D n rhI srIr hwlcwl prI mry Awps mYN db hI ]
transliteration: Bhaage Bahu Boor Kaahoo Suddh Na Rahoo Daroordhaaldhaal Daroo||
translation: Many warriors ran away, none of them remained conscious about his body, there was so much uproar, and many of them died by mutual pressing.

gurmukhi: pyK surrwie mn hrK bFwie sur puMjn bulwie krY jY jY kwr sb hI ]209]
transliteration: Pekh Sur-raae Man Harakh Badhaae Sur Pounjan Bulaae Darai Jai Jai Kaar Sab Hoo||209||
translation: Seeing the demon being killed, Indra, the king of gods, was very much pleased in his mind and calling all the groups of gods, he hailed the vicory.209.

gurmukhi: kRoDmwn BihE kihE rwjw sB dYqn ko AYso ju`Du kIno kwlI fwirE bIr mwr kY ]
transliteration: Krodhmaan Bhahio Kahio Raajaa Sabh Daitan Ko Aiso Juddh(u) Koono Kaaloo Daario Boor Maar Kai||
translation: The king Sumbh became very furious and told all the demons: “That kali hath waged she hath killed and thrown down my warriors.”

gurmukhi: bl ko sMBwr kr lInI krvwr Fwr pYTo rn miD mwir mwir ieau aucwr kY ]
transliteration: Bal Ko Sanbhaar Kar Loonoo Karvaar Dhaar Paitho Ran Madh(i) Daar(i) Daar(i) Io Ouchaar Kai||
translation: Recouping his power, Sumbh held his sword and shield in his hands and shouting “Kill, Kill”, he entered the battlefield.

gurmukhi: swQ Bey suMB ky su mhwN bIr DIr joDy lIny hiQAwr Awp Awpny sMBwr kY ]
transliteration: Saath Bhae Sounbh Ke Su Mahaan Boor Dhoor Jodhe Loone Hathiaar Aap Aapne Sanbhaar Kai||
translation: The great heroes and warriors of great composure, took their poser, accompanied Sumbh.

gurmukhi: AYsy cly dwno riv sMfl Cpwno mwno slB aufwno puMj pMKn suDwr kY ]210]
transliteration: Aise Chale Daano Rav(i) Mandal Chhapaano Maano Salabh Udaano Pounj Pankhan Sudhaar Kai||210||
translation: The demons marched like the flying locust swarms in order to enshroud the sun.210.
